Welcome to The Epoch Times App! 
Get Real News Other Media Outlets Don't Report. 

As an independent, nonpartisan and honest newspaper, we deliver truth and tradition.
We constantly improve our App to serve you. This release contains: 
- UI improvement 
- bug fixes
- user comment guidelines

Get Real News Other Media Outlets Don't Report. 
As an independent, nonpartisan, and honest newspaper, we deliver truth and tradition. We are constantly improving our app to best serve you. This release contains: 
- Redesign of the Top Page
- Epoch Inspired articles added 
- CCP Virus special coverage added 
- Our exclusive China in Focus program added to the video section
- UI/UX significantly improved. 

Please send your questions and feedback to: app@epochtimes.nyc.
